mc_retry_fsm_tag.1: IDLE to RETRY_TRANSIENT, retry_go active and transient retry enabled
mc_retry_fsm_tag.2: RETRY_TRANSIENT to CHECK_THRESHOLD, ReadDeallocStatus valid with error
mc_retry_fsm_tag.3: RETRY_TRANSIENT to LOG, ReadDeallocStatus valid without error
mc_retry_fsm_tag.6: CHECK_THRESHOLD to LOG, error threshold met with ufill
mc_retry_fsm_tag.7: CHECK_THRESHOLD to RETRY_CORR, error threshold not met
mc_retry_fsm_tag.8: RETRY_CORR to CHECK_THRESHOLD, ReadDeallocStatus valid with error
mc_retry_fsm_tag.9: RETRY_CORR to LOG, ReadDeallocStatus valid without error
mc_retry_fsm_tag.12: LOG to SCRUB_WR, transitioning to scrub write
mc_retry_fsm_tag.13: SCRUB_WR, waiting for scrub write conditions
mc_retry_fsm_tag.14: SCRUB_WR to DEALLOC, scrub write wait complete
mc_retry_fsm_tag.15: DEALLOC to IDLE, no scrub or gs_dealloc active
mc_retry_fsm_tag.17: RETRY_CORR, waiting for PFD to start
mc_retry_fsm_tag.19: PFD_RD, waiting for PFD read done
mc_retry_fsm_tag.20: RETRY_TRANSIENT to LOG, dealloc or link fail
mc_retry_fsm_tag.21: RETRY_CORR to LOG, dealloc or link fail
mc_retry_fsm_tag.22: IDLE to RETRY_CORR, retry_go active with ufill or patrol
mc_retry_fsm_tag.23: IDLE to RETRY_CORR, disable_transient retry with patrol entry
mc_retry_fsm_tag.24: RETRY_CORR to PFD_WR, PFD go active
mc_retry_fsm_tag.26: PFD_RD to PFD_CHECK_THRESHOLD, PFD read done
mc_retry_fsm_tag.27: PFD_CHECK_THRESHOLD to PFD_VOTE, read threshold met
mc_retry_fsm_tag.28: PFD_CHECK_THRESHOLD to PFD_RD, read threshold not met
mc_retry_fsm_tag.29: PFD_VOTE to LOG, link fail detected
mc_retry_fsm_tag.30: PFD_VOTE to PFD_WR_BACK, no link fail and forced error
mc_retry_fsm_tag.33: PFD_VOTE to PFD_WR_BACK, link error resolved
mc_retry_fsm_tag.34: PFD_VOTE, waiting for link error resolution
mc_retry_fsm_tag.37: DEALLOC, waiting for dealloc or gs_dealloc
mc_retry_fsm_tag.41: RETRY_CORR, reset Corr FSM after link error
mc_retry_fsm_tag.42: LOG to IDLE, in spare window
mc_retry_fsm_tag.43: LOG, in spare window waiting for RAT or blinding

mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.36: Idle to Block: Trigger Master Retry
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.1: Block to Pre Link Fail: Link Fail Detected
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.2: Block to Drain Wait: Conditions Met
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.51: Drain Wait to WDB ECC Scrub: WDB ECC Error
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.37: Drain Wait to Link Retry: No WDB ECC Error
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.52: WDB ECC Scrub to Link Retry: No WDB ECC Error
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.6: Link Retry to Patrol Drain: No Link Error and No ECC Error
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.49: Link Retry to Patrol Retry: Patrol ECC Error
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.45: Link Retry to Pre Link Fail: Link Fail Detected
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.8: Patrol Drain to Block: Link Error Detected
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.9: Patrol Drain to Block: ECC Error Detected
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.47: Patrol Drain to Pre Link Fail: Link Fail Detected
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.10: Patrol Drain to Wrtrkr Drain: No Errors
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.15: Patrol Drain to Pwr ECC Retry: Ufill Error
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.12: Patrol Retry to Patrol Retry Wait: ECC Retry Done
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.58: Patrol Retry Wait to Patrol Retry: Patrol ECC Error
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.59: Patrol Retry Wait to Patrol Drain: No Errors
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.57: Patrol Retry Wait to Pre Link Fail: Link Fail Detected
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.5: Wrtrkr Drain to Pre Link Fail: Link Fail Detected
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.14: Wrtrkr Drain to Block: Link Error Detected
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.38: Wrtrkr Drain to Block: Ufill ECC Error
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.16: Wrtrkr Drain to Rd ECC Retry: First Error is Read
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.17: Wrtrkr Drain to Unblock: No Read Error
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.19: Pwr ECC Retry to Pwr ECC Retry Wait: ECC Retry Done
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.39: Pwr ECC Retry Wait to Pwr ECC Retry: Ufill Error
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.40: Pwr ECC Retry Wait to Wrtrkr Drain: No Ufill Error
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.21: Rd ECC Retry to Rd ECC Retry Wait: ECC Retry Done
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.60: Rd ECC Retry Wait to Pre Link Fail: Link Fail Detected
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.61: Rd ECC Retry Wait to Rd ECC Retry: Read Error
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.62: Rd ECC Retry Wait to Unblock: No Read Error
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.23: Unblock to Pre Link Fail: Link Fail Detected
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.25: Unblock to Idle: No Link Error
mc_mstr_retry_fsm_tag.41: Pre Link Fail to Link Fail: Conditions Met
